item.title: Shop Topbar Filter Top Category v2
item.dc:creator: wpthemego
item.content:encoded: <select class="jet-sorting-select" name="select-name" > <option value="">Sort by...</option> <option value="{"orderby":"title","order":"ASC"}" >By title from lowest to highest</option> <option value="{"orderby":"title","order":"DESC"}" >By title from highest to lowest</option> <option value="{"orderby":"date","order":"ASC"}" >By date from lowest to highest</option> <option value="{"orderby":"date","order":"DESC"}" >By date from highest to lowest</option> </select> Filter Categories Select some options <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="239" data-label="Uncategorized" > Uncategorized </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="227" data-label="Bathroom" > Bathroom </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="223" data-label="Beauty" > Beauty </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="228" data-label="Bedroom" > Bedroom </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="229" data-label="Decor" > Decor </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="28" data-label="Electronics" > Electronics </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="27" data-label="Fashion" > Fashion </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="225" data-label="Food" > Food </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="224" data-label="Furniture" > Furniture </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="230" data-label="Livingroom" > Livingroom </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="235" data-label="Smartphones" > Smartphones </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="236" data-label="Watchs" > Watchs </label> Show More Filter by price <input type="range" step="1" min="40" max="340" value="40" tabindex="-1"> <input type="range" step="1" min="40" max="340" value="340" tabindex="-1"> $40 â€” $340 Color Filter Select some options <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-color-image-list__input" name="pa_color" value="84" data-label="Green" > Green </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-color-image-list__input" name="pa_color" value="83" data-label="Red" > Red </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-color-image-list__input" name="pa_color" value="81" data-label="Grey" > Grey </label> Size Filter Select some options <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="254" data-label="XXL" > XXL </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="86" data-label="L" > L </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="88" data-label="M" > M </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="87" data-label="S" > S </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="85" data-label="XL" > XL </label> Brand Filter Select some options <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_brand" value="211" data-label="Asnaghi" > Asnaghi </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_brand" value="210" data-label="Formenti" > Formenti </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_brand" value="207" data-label="Mariner" > Mariner </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_brand" value="209" data-label="Valente" > Valente </label> <button type="button" class="jet-remove-all-filters__button" data-content-provider="epro-archive-products" data-additional-providers="" data-apply-type="ajax" data-query-id="default" > Clear filters </button>
